teaser: The jobs report for May, the worth of California Chrome, and what business can learn from soccer
contentencoded: More on the numbers from the jobs report for May. Plus, despite being a prize-winning horse, California Chrome isn't expected to fetch top dollar. Why bloodline determines price more than prizes. Also, hear what businesses should learn from professional soccer teams when it comes to diversity.
title: PODCAST: 217,000 new jobs
